select b.id, b.mobile, b.expected_date_of_confinement, c.real_name, c.height, c.weight, c.birthday, d.average_value as currentWeight, d.add_time as lastWeightTime from hospital_user_info as a LEFT JOIN jumper_anglesound.user_info as b on a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN jumper_anglesound.user_extra_info as c on a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN ( select user_id, average_value, add_time from jumper_anglesound.user_weight_record as t where t.add_time = (select max(add_time) from jumper_anglesound.user_weight_record where user_id = t.user_id) ) as d on a.user_id = d.user_id where b.id is not null GROUP BY b.id
